member.name: MINIMIZEDMETRICS
member.summary: Contains the scalable metrics associated with minimized windows. This structure is used with the function when the SPI_GETMINIMIZEDMETRICS or SPI_SETMINIMIZEDMETRICS action value is specified.

member.name: MINIMIZEDMETRICS.cbSize
member.summary: The size of the structure, in bytes. The caller must set this to sizeof(MINIMIZEDMETRICS).

member.name: MINIMIZEDMETRICS.iWidth
member.summary: The width of minimized windows, in pixels.

member.name: MINIMIZEDMETRICS.iHorzGap
member.summary: The horizontal space between arranged minimized windows, in pixels.

member.name: MINIMIZEDMETRICS.iVertGap
member.summary: The vertical space between arranged minimized windows, in pixels.

summary.para: The starting position and direction used when arranging minimized windows. The starting position must be one of the following values.

listheader.description: Start at the lower-left corner of the work area.
Start at the lower-right corner of the work area.
Start at the upper-left corner of the work area.
Start at the upper-right corner of the work area.

summary.para: The direction must be one of the following values.

listheader.description: Arrange left (valid with ARW_BOTTOMRIGHT and ARW_TOPRIGHT only).
Arrange right (valid with ARW_BOTTOMLEFT and ARW_TOPLEFT only).
Arrange up (valid with ARW_BOTTOMLEFT and ARW_BOTTOMRIGHT only).
Arrange down (valid with ARW_TOPLEFT and ARW_TOPRIGHT only).
Hide minimized windows by moving them off the visible area of the screen.
